participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: adventurous and independent, loves the thrill of speed and the freedom of the open road.
participant_1.background: my main transportation is my motorbike. i've light skin with big brown eyes. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: easygoing and sociable, always looking for a good time with friends and enjoys exploring new places.
participant_2.background: i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. i just want to have fun with my friends. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work part-time at burger king.
